item.title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined character trailer – Aishe
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

A young Roamer determined to restore the Almighty.

Square Enix has released the fifth character trailer for Dragon Quest VII Reimagined, introducing Aishe, a young Roamer determined to restore the Almighty.

Aishe’s character description reads, “A young Roamer woman devoted to the Earth Spirit, determined to restore the Almighty. Skilled in swordsmanship, she is also gifted with a natural talent for dance.”

Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on February 5, 2026 worldwide. Read more about the game here here, and here.

Watch the trailer below.

Character Trailer: Aishe

item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds ‘Title Update 4’ trailer, details, and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Team up with Nadia and Fabius to take down Gogmazios.

Capcom has released the official trailer, information, and screenshots for Monster Hunter Wilds‘ fourth free Title Update, which is due out on December 16.

Title Update 4 will add the following content:

■ Elder Dragon: Gogmazios

Note: Available after completing the main mission “A First Cry.”

For this special quest, up to four hunters can join forces with support hunters to form parties of eight! Team up with Nadia and Fabius to take down Gogmazios!

Complete the Gogmazios Extra Mission to unlock a permanent event quest for repeated play.

Gogma Artian Weapons

You can upgrade Rarity 8 Artian Weapons into Gogma Artian Weapons using materials obtained from Gogmazios.

Note: Upgraded weapons will retain their existing reinforcement bonuses.

Gogma Artian Weapons have one bonus skill and one group skill chosen at random.

Gogma Reinforce also allows you to retain your reinforcement bonuses or—for those with loftier aspirations—reset your skills completely. The Reset Skills option allows you to use Gogma materials to reset the bonus skill and group skill applied to a weapon.

Armor Transcendence

Transcendence allows hunters at HR 100+ to upgrade armor even further.
Transcending raises the limits imposed on Armor Sphere upgrades and powers up the decoration slots of rarity 5 and 6 armor.

Upgrade your armor and get ready to face the ferocious Gogmazios head on!

■ New Arch-Tempered Monster

Arch-Tempered Jin Dahaad Strikes in an Event Quest!

Face Arch-tempered Jin Dahaad in the ultimate hunting challenge!

New permanent quests will be available from Wednesday, December 24, 2025, and new free challenge quests will be available for a limited time from Wednesday, January 7, 2026!

  • ❮
  • ❯

■ Added Features

New Support Hunters

Wielding a light bowgun, Nadia will provide vital support in your fight against Gogmazios!

Griffin, a great sword wielder from Ferrum Unit, and Nightmist, a light bowgun wielder from Aurora Unit, can also join you in battle.

New Optional Quests

High-difficulty quests featuring multiple 9★ monsters have been added. Complete these quests to receive special nameplates as bragging rights!
Note: Not awarded to Hunters who join after the quest has started.

Time to put your mettle to the test!

Hunters can also try their hand at Hunting Exercises, which pit you against tempered 9★ monsters.

Event Quests Incoming

For a limited time, there will be quests that let you forge special equipment, farm Heavy Armor Spheres, and much more!

■ Seasonal Event – Festival of Accord: Lumenhymn

Event Time: Friday, December 19, 2025 to Wednesday, January 14, 2026

Light Up With Winter Festivities!

The Grand Hub is ready to make you feel cozy with wintry delights! Enjoy a seasonal meal, special new equipment, gestures, and pop-up camp decorations.
In addition to various login bonuses and event quests, Fabius and Nadia can join your party as support hunters for a limited time, allowing you to fight alongside some of the Guild’s strongest members.

A dazzling Grand Hub awaits you!

■ Downloadable Content

  • Photo Poses (free) – Four beloved poses from prior games will be available for free.
  • Character & Palico Edit Voucher (free) A Character Edit Voucher and Palico Edit Voucher will be distributed to players for free. Note: Players can use this voucher regardless of whether they used the first free ticket distributed at the launch of the game.
  • Cosmetic DLC Pack 4 (paid) – Add fresh visual flair to your hunting adventure with “Cosmetic DLC Pack 4,” a bundle of stylish content! New layered weapons for each weapon type have been added. Note: “Cosmetic DLC Pack 4” is not included with the Premium Deluxe Edition or the Cosmetic DLC Pass. Note: The contents of Cosmetic DLC Pack 4 can also be obtained separately. Please be careful of obtaining duplicate content.

■ Free Title Update Roadmap

■ Steam Version Stability Updates Roadmap

Monster Hunter Wilds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch the trailer an an archive of today’s Monster Hunter Showcase below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

Free Title Update 4

English

Japanese

Monster Hunter Showcase: December 2025

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/monster-hunter-wilds-title-update-4-trailer-details-and-screenshots

item.title: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection ‘Habitat Restoration’ trailer, details, and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Endangered species, invasive monsters, and monster raising.

Capcom has released a new trailer, information, and screenshots for Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection introducing the game’s endangered species, invasive monsters, and monster raising.

Here are the details:

■ Endangered Species and Invasive Monsters

Finding and securing endangered species’ eggs in order to protect and restore the natural environment is one of the important duties for the Rangers, the group of which the protagonist is the captain.

With the Crystal Encroachment threatening the ecosystem, and invasive monsters running amok, Rathalos are not the only species considered endangered.

Invasive monsters are incredibly strong, able to threaten other monsters and take over their territory.

Dens in their territory sometimes contain endangered species’ eggs.

Invasive Monster Retreat Battles

The Rangers find an Invasive monster and hope to rescue an endangered species’ egg, but it won’t be an easy task.

Instead of slaying the monster in battle, they’ll try to drive the Invasive monster back to its den.

Invasive monsters are incredibly strong: they can’t be beaten using normal battle tactics.

Sneak into the invasive monster’s den while it’s sleeping… then grab the endangered egg and run for it!

Find out how to make an invasive monster retreat, in this new twist on the classic Stories gameplay.

  • ❮
  • ❯

■ Raising Monsters

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection provides a new gameplay cycle where you can protect monsters,
preserve their ecosystem, and truly roleplay as a Ranger.

Form a new and exciting relationship with the Monsties you raise!

Habitat Restoration

After hatching a monster, release it into the wild, allowing it to put down roots and rebuild the species.

The Rangers call this practice Habitat Restoration.

When a monster population has been restored, their eggs can be found and hatched into Monstie partners. Habitat Restoration can be performed with more than just endangered species as well.

Ecosystem Rank

Hatching and releasing monsters into the wild will affect that area’s Ecosystem Rank.

As the Ecosystem Rank rises, eggs become easier to obtain,
and Monsties can hatch with special skills or genes.

There are even special monsters that can only be obtained through Habitat Restoration!

Dual-Element Monsters

Raising the Ecosystem Rank can even allow you to find monsters imbued with that area’s element.

Monsters with an area’s element applied to them are called Dual-Element monsters.

For example, a monster that is normally thunder element may be influenced by the fire element of the area where it is hatched from, causing it to be born with fire skills and even fire appearances.

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on March 13, 2026.

Watch the trailer an an archive of today’s Monster Hunter Showcase below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

Habitat Restoration Trailer

English

Japanese

Monster Hunter Showcase: December 2025

English

Japanese

item.title: Nippon Ichi Software announces dungeon crawler RPG Curse Warrior for PS5, PS4, and Switch
item.content:encoded:
■ Specifications

  • Title: Curse Warrior
  • Genre: Dungeon Crawler RPG
  • Platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch
  • Release Date: March 26, 2026 (Japan)
  • Players: 1
  • Price: 7,200 yen (7,920 yen with tax)
  • Publisher: Nippon Ichi Software
  • Development Supervisor: Yoshihiko Toda
  • Developer: guruguru
  • CERO Rating: C (ages 15 and older)
  • Official Website: nippon1.jp
  • Official Hashtag: #CurseWarrior
  • Copyright: ©2026 Nippon Ichi Software, Inc.

■ About the Game

Curse Warrior is a dungeon crawler RPG where you explore and conquer the underground labyrinth “Eclipse,” filled with curses.

In the dungeon, your party members may become cursed through various actions.

Since curses alter the abilities and actions of your party members, players must constantly monitor the state of their party and make crucial decisions on how to proceed. Build stronger characters while managing and adjusting the effects of curses to successfully clear the dungeon.

■ Story

This is the story of a great adventure carried out by an adventurer one year ago…

The city of Echoes, a scenic transportation hub, is situated near a rich sea. But its inhabitants live in constant fear of monster attacks emerging from the nearby underground labyrinth, Eclipse.

As an adventurer in Echoes, you were taking on small requests and exploration jobs when a new request came your way—to explore the Eclipse labyrinth and defeat the monsters. Apparently, the entire city is calling on adventurers to subjugate the beasts.

Exploring a dungeon filled with curses and overrun by monsters is a perilous task… Even so, you have decided to fight for the city.

With the city’s peace—and the anticipation of hidden treasure in the labyrinth—driving you forward…

■ Game System

Prepare for Dangerous Dungeon Exploration

Players will venture into the Eclipse labyrinth, the source of the monster outbreak plaguing the city.

—The city of Echoes serves as your base. Prepare your party and plan carefully before heading out on your exploration. As you progress through the dungeon, new facilities will open throughout the city.

Eclipse is surrounded by several other dungeons, and your journey begins with exploring these surrounding dungeons.

—As the story progresses, more dungeons will become accessible.

You will explore dungeons by accepting a “quest” at the entrance.

—The objectives of these quests vary.

By completing quests, you will earn experience points and gold. If you are wiped out or abandon a quest halfway, you will not receive any of the items or experience gained during exploration, and your party will not grow stronger. Keep an eye on your party’s status and decide whether to continue or retreat.

Utilize Skills in Command-Based Battles

Battles in the dungeon are command-based. Characters fight using basic attacks, defense, and specialized “skills” unique to their class.

—When you select an attack or skill, the estimated damage to the enemy will be displayed.

You can recruit party members from eight different jobs, each with unique attack ranges and specialty skills. It is important to carefully consider your party’s strengths, weaknesses, and skills to build and utilize a balanced team.

—Each character has two skills, and even characters of the same class may have different skills.

Curses: Key to Exploration and Strengthening Your Party

The most important feature of Curse Warrior is “curses.” In the dungeon, your party members will be cursed by enemy attacks and dungeon traps.

—No matter how careful you are, it is impossible to explore the dungeon without being affected by curses.

Curses can have various effects that either assist or impede battles and exploration. These effects can include persistent buffs and debuffs, as well as effects that trigger at the start of a character’s turn or when they attack.

—For example, the curse “Resilience” increases defense but decreases maximum HP. The currently active curse effect is indicated by a glowing icon.

Each curse has both positive and negative effects. Positive effects might include HP recovery, extra damage, or parrying attacks. Negative effects may include increased damage taken, reduced stats, ignoring player commands, or even attacking your own party members.

Curse Fusion

Another element of the game is “Curse Fusion,” where two or three curses can be combined to form a more powerful curse.

—By fusing two curses…

—A new, higher-level curse is born!

Higher-level curses have stronger effects and higher activation rates. Characters with high-level curses might also take unexpected actions during combat…

Since you can hold up to six curses at once, and each curse has two effects, you could have up to 12 different effects active. A character’s abilities will fluctuate depending on the activation rate and timing of these effects. Understanding how curses work and how to fight with them is crucial to victory.

Curse Gauge

Each party member has a “Curse Gauge” that fills up as they are hit by enemy attacks. When the Curse Gauge reaches 100 percent, that character will be afflicted by a new curse.

But if the Curse Gauge surpasses 300 percent, the character will die from the curse. Before reaching the lethal limit, you must consider retreating or returning to town for treatment.

Managing Curses in Echoes

While each curse has multiple effects, you can use the city’s “Curse Removal Facility” to remove specific effects.

—One of the effects of the “Resilience” curse is “increased damage taken.” This negative effect can be removed at the Curse Removal Facility.

The Curse Removal Facility gives you a level of control over the dungeon’s randomly afflicted curses.

—While a curse is being removed, that party member cannot participate in dungeon exploration. Be sure to level up your backup members too.

Removing curses earns you “Purification Points,” which can be used to enhance city facilities, as well as in other situations. Removing curses with beneficial effects will yield more Purification Points, so there may be situations where it is worth expelling positive curses.

—By upgrading the city’s facilities, you can further strengthen your party!

As you progress deeper into the dungeon, curses will stack up, limiting your characters’ actions and making battles increasingly difficult. To overcome this, you must accept, manage, and utilize the curses. What kind of curses you receive, how they affect your party, and whether you should retreat or push forward—the decisions you make will directly impact the success of your exploration and the survival of your party.

■ Unique and Reliable Adventurers

There are eight different classes of recruitable adventurers, each with unique abilities and appearances. Each class has its own specialized attack types, curse resistances, and optimal positions in battle.

Adventurers possess two “skills.” Each class has a randomly chosen skill set. For example, Fighters and Barbarians have special attacks against biological monsters, while Archers and Rangers have skills that lower the enemy’s defense. Even adventurers within the same class will have different skills.

—You can meet adventurers at the tavern in the city of Echoes. The adventurers you encounter will change daily.

Fighter / Barbarian

  • Specializes in close combat, with high durability and damage output.
  • Highly resistant to stun effects.
  • Has the lowest speed stat among all jobs.
  • Optimal position is in the front line.
  • Skills:
    • Biological Special Attack – Deals significant damage to biological type monsters.
    • Power Attack – Deals heavy damage.
    • Consecutive Attacks – Attacks a target multiple times.
    • etc.

—Fighter

—Barbarian

Ranger / Archer

  • Has high accuracy and specializes in long-range physical attacks from the rear.
  • High speed but low defense, making them vulnerable to damage.
  • Optimal position is in the rear line.
  • Skills:
    • Pierce – Lowers the target’s defense before attacking.
    • Poison Special Attack – Deals significant damage to poisoned enemies.
    • Random Attack – Attacks multiple enemies randomly.
    • etc.

—Ranger

—Archer

Cleric / Paladin

  • A tank class with high durability and defense.
  • Despite being a tank, they have a high critical rate and are reliable attackers.
  • Has the lowest curse resistance rate, making them more prone to curses.
  • Optimal position is in the front line.
  • Skills:
    • Undead Special Attack – Deals significant damage to undead monsters.
    • Heal – Restores HP to allies within range.
    • Self-Sacrifice – Draws enemy attacks toward them and boosts their defense.
    • etc.

—Cleric

—Paladin

Wizard / Sorcerer

  • Has a high accuracy rate.
  • Has the lowest defense among all jobs, putting them in danger when targeted.
  • Optimal position is in the rear line.
  • Skills:
    • Spirit Special Attack – Deals significant damage to spirit type monsters.
    • Enhance – Grants specific enhancement effects to the target.
    • Wide-Range Attack – Deals damage to the entire enemy party.
    • etc.

The monsters in the dungeon are formidable foes. By properly preparing for dungeon exploration in town and training your party, you can increase your chances of returning alive.

—Wizard

—Sorcerer

■ Box Art

PlayStation 5

Switch

item.title: The Rumble Fish 2 coming to Switch 2 on January 22, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

A $5 upgrade from the Switch version.

Publisher 3goo and developer Dimps have announced The Rumble Fish 2 – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition. It will launch on January 22, 2026 worldwide for $19.99 / €19.99 / 2,480 yen. Users who already own the Switch version can purchase an “Upgrade Pack” for $4.99 / €4.99 / 500 yen.

The re-release of the arcade fighting game The Rumble Fish 2 first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on December 8, 2022.

Here is an overview of the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, via its official website:

About

Developed by Dimps and released in 2005, The Rumble Fish 2 delighted players with its flashy, technical gameplay governed by five buttons and two super move gauges and stood out with a unique, colorful cast of 16 characters punctuated by the game’s innovative “Smooth Model Animation” system, allowing for 2D sprite animation on a per-limb basis.

This port has many new features seen in modern fighting games, including a training mode with plenty of features for player to hone their skills, online player-versus-player powered by rollback netcode, options for both 4:3 and 16:9 screen size at 60 frames per second, and a gallery mode to enjoy the timeless artwork.

Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Features

  • New Game Mode: Team Battle – Pick three of your favorite characters and take on your opponent’s team in the new Team Battle mode. Master this new game mode playing offline or online.
  • Graphical Update – Experience the game with improved graphics.
  • Cross-Play with Nintendo Switch – Play with your friends on Nintendo Switch with online cross-play.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Announce Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/the-rumble-fish-2-coming-to-switch-2-on-january-22-2026

item.title: Kei truck driving action game DriveCrazy now available for PC, coming to PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Race through a collapsing Japan in a kei truck.

High-speed kei truck driving action game DriveCrazy has left Early Access and is now available for PC via Steam at a 20 percent-off launch discount price of $7.19, publisher AMATA Games and developer TubezGames announced. After December 24, the price will change to $9.99. PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch versions are planned for release in 2026.

DriveCrazy first launched in Early Access on July 31, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via it Steam page:

About

DriveCrazy is a high-tension driving action game set in Japan, which is on the verge of collapse due to an alien invasion, where you race freely in a “Kei Truck” (light truck). The player, a Kei Truck driver caught up in an anomaly while participating in the “Kei Truck Rally 20XX,” must evade attacks from a mysterious organization and colossal creatures.

Key Features

  • Race Through a Collapsing Japan in a Kei Truck – You are under attack by aliens! Dodge their assaults!
  • Run Up Walls and Avoid Attacks – Please note that driving in this manner is extremely dangerous and must never be attempted in real life.
  • Destroy Things to Recover Nitro – We have no idea why Nitro recovers when you destroy things.
  • Counterattack the Enemies
  • Battle Against Colossal Creatures
  • The Game Progresses by Clearing Stages – There are stages where smaller enemies appear, and stages where you fight huge bosses. Some stages feature no enemies at all.
  • Compete With Other Players in the Online Ranking – The game features an online ranking system where scores and clear times are recorded for each stage, allowing you to compete with other players.

Watch the launch trailer below.

Launch Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/kei-truck-driving-action-game-drivecrazy-now-available-for-pc-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-and-switch-in-2026

item.title: Nintendo GameCube – Nintendo Classics adds Wario World
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

Ready to rumble with Wario?

Wario World is now available via the Nintendo GameCube – Nintendo Classics app for Switch 2, Nintendo announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via the back of its box:

Ready to rumble with Wario?

You’d BETTER be ready, punk! Some evil jewel transformed all of my treasure into monsters, and now I gotta go to this weird world and beat it out of ’em! There are plenty of goons waiting for a shot at old Wario, but don’t worry about me, baby I’m ready to brawl! I’ll be throwing punches, charging through crowds, and piledriving ugly mugs right and left. What you gotta worry about is keeping me alive. Can you handle that, or do I have to give you a knuckle sandwich too?

Watch a trailer below.

Wario World Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/nintendo-gamecube-nintendo-classics-adds-wario-world
